name: Mervin TORIAN, Petitioner v. Kenneth CAMERON, S.C.I. Cresson, P.O. Box a Cresson; PA 16699-0001, Hugh J. Burns, Esquire, Three S. Penn Square Philadelphia, PA 19107, District Attorney, Respondents

parties: Mervin TORIAN, Petitioner v. Kenneth CAMERON, S.C.I. Cresson, P.O. Box a Cresson; PA 16699-0001, Hugh J. Burns, Esquire, Three S. Penn Square Philadelphia, PA 19107, District Attorney, Respondents.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 25th day of September, 2008, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED, and the Petition for Writ of Habeas Corpus is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:

Mervin TORIAN, Petitioner v. Kenneth CAMERON, S.C.I. Cresson, P.O. Box a Cresson; PA 16699-0001, Hugh J. Burns, Esquire, Three S. Penn Square Philadelphia, PA 19107, District Attorney, Respondents.
No. 110 EM 2008.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Sept. 25, 2008.
